pages.text: The mobs are not the same as the ones you are used to. They have been buffed to be a major challenge and obstacle.$(br)Changes by $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/enhanced-ai)Enhanced AI$()

You will notice that some mobs have new abilities and behaviors such as:$(br)- Overhaul of the pathfinding and player detection system $(br)- Most mobs can now climb stairs and swim faster$(br)- Some zombies can now break blocks, you are never safe.$(br)- Skeletons shoot extremely accurately and will try to run away from you if you get close$(br)- Creepers can move while exploding$(br)- Spiders will dash towards you$(br)- Melee mobs will attack you way faster$(br)- Zombies can bite you if you attack them without protection$(br)And more!
